channel.title: Museums on Aliens in the Apple
channel.description: Recent content in Museums on Aliens in the Apple

item.title: A little time travel into the past: June
item.description: In early June, Marica and Esther performed and did really well at their annual piano recital. They both played solo pieces and also performed a duet. I was a proud mama! The highlight of June was a visit from my sister Angelique and nephew Tyson.

item.title: Roadtrip ’16: Monticello
item.description: This year was the happy year where a US Hoyt reunion took place. This time was again in Georgia, so back in June we took a two and a half week long roadtrip down south. It worked out well that Ben happened to be between jobs at that point so he took 3 weeks off, which was so great.

item.title: Homeschool field trip
item.description: One weekend in May we took the girls in to the Ancient Egyptian section of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, because in our history program we’d been studying Ancient Egypt. It was great to see many of the things we (including myself!
